Question: At thirteen, this person was apprenticed to the painter Domenico Ghirlandaio.
Hints: In 1505, this person was invited back to Rome by the newly elected Pope Julius II He was commissioned to build the Pope's tomb.
The tomb, of which the central feature is this person's statue of Moses, was never finished to this person's satisfaction.
This person labored on the project from 1534 to October 1541.
